name: Midnight Copy
description:
A short horror game made for the 206th Trijam game jam
The theme is Just another copy

You left your keys on the boss' desk. While retrieving the keys, your boss asks if you can copy the document on his desk for an important meeting tomorrow morning abroad. It is already late, you better copy the document before midnight...

Controls Move (forward with rotation)A-W-D SprintSHIFT + A-W-DToggle flashlight (doesn't affect gameplay)FInteract (printer, storage & items)ESkip dialogue & menuENTER/ SPACE Development

Made in 3 hours +  a few minutes of bug fixing. Please indicate game-breaking problems so I can adjust them

  • Engine: Godot 3.5.1 Stable
  • Art: Aseprite (self-made)
  • Music: https://freesound.org/people/unfa/sounds/157133/
  • Fx: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/horror/
  • Music & FX edited in Ableton Lite 11
Enjoy the little experience!
